dataset.title: Temporary Ponds of Peninsular Spain (TemPoPS): An Integrative Dataset Supporting Research and Conservation of an Endangered Habitat

creator.organizationName: Inland-Water Ecosystems Team (I-WET), Departamento de Ecología, Universidad Autónoma de Madrid, Madrid, Spain
Centro de Investigación en Biodiversidad y Cambio Global, Universidad Autónoma de Madrid, Madrid, Spain
Department of Ecology and Evolution, Doñana Biological Station (CSIC), Seville, Spain
Inland-Water Ecosystems Team (I-WET), Departamento de Ecología, Universidad Autónoma de Madrid, Madrid, Spain
Centro de Investigación en Biodiversidad y Cambio Global, Universidad Autónoma de Madrid, Madrid, Spain
Department of Ecology and Evolution, Doñana Biological Station (CSIC), Seville, Spain

abstract.para: This dataset integrates georeferenced records of temporary ponds derived from multiple sources. It harmonizes nomenclature, coordinates, protected-area codes, and source provenance, providing a consolidated reference for ecological, conservation, and biogeographical analyses.

additionalInfo.para: Primary funding was provided by Ministerio de Ciencia e Innovación, project ClimaRiskinPond (PID2019-104580GA-I00).
Christian Arnanz was supported by MCIN/AEI/10.13039/501100011033 and European Social Fund, grant PRE2020–668094732.
Margarita Florencio received a Ramón y Cajal contract (RyC2022-036451-I) funded by MICIU/AEI/10.13039/501100011033 and European Social Fund.

intellectualRights.para: This dataset is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License (CC BY 4.0). Users may share and adapt the material for any purpose, provided proper attribution is given.

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Geographical extent of all temporary ponds included in the dataset (peninsular Spain)

contact.organizationName: Inland-Water Ecosystems Team (I-WET), Departamento de Ecología, Universidad Autónoma de Madrid, Madrid, Spain
Centro de Investigación en Biodiversidad y Cambio Global, Universidad Autónoma de Madrid, Madrid, Spain

description.para: The dataset was developed through the integration of multiple sources documenting temporary ponds, including bibliographic references, administrative datasets, expert-contributed databases obtained through direct consultation, citizen science platforms and visual interpretation. To ensure consistency, all sources were harmonized using a standardized workflow, implemented either manually or through R processing. Initially, a subset of sources was manually processed to establish a foundational dataset. Subsequently, the R-based workflow was applied to expand and refine the dataset by consolidating duplicate records into unique entries. Each pond was assigned synthetic identifiers and coordinates, while original descriptive information available from the sources (NAME, ID, coordinates) was preserved to maintain data integrity. Polygons corresponding to polygon-based sources were compiled into a synthetic GeoPackage file included with the dataset, with each pond linked to its associated polygon(s) via newly created identifiers. Information about Protected Areas associated to each pond is provided, for both Natura 2000 and other Protected Areas. Detailed methods can be consulted in the original data paper

project.title: Towards the conservation perspective of temporary ponds to face climate change and alien species invasions (ClimaRiskinPond)

personnel.organizationName: Estación Biológica de Doñana (CSIC), Seville, Spain

dataTable.entityDescription: Dataset integrating multiple sources describing temporary ponds in Peninsular Spain

attribute.attributeDefinition: Synthetic name assigned to each temporary pond based on original source information, if available (not unique).

textDomain.definition: Synthetic name assigned to each temporary pond based on original source information, if available (not unique).

attribute.attributeDefinition: Unique identifier for each pond, combining an abbreviation for province names with a numeric value ranging from 0 to 1000.

textDomain.definition: Unique identifier for each pond, combining an abbreviation for province names with a numeric value ranging from 0 to 1000.

attribute.attributeDefinition: Longitude coordinate in EPSG:4326.
Latitude coordinate in EPSG:4326.
Code identifying the Natura 2000 site(s). If multiple codes are provided, they are separated by semicolons (;).

textDomain.definition: Code identifying the Natura 2000 site(s). If multiple codes are provided, they are separated by semicolons (;).

attribute.attributeDefinition: Official name of the Natura 2000 site(s). If multiple names are provided, they are separated by semicolons (;).

textDomain.definition: Official name of the Natura 2000 site(s). If multiple names are provided, they are separated by semicolons (;).

attribute.attributeDefinition: Designation for other Protected Area categories(s). If multiple designations are provided, they are separated by semicolons (;).

textDomain.definition: Designation for other Protected Area categories(s). If multiple designations are provided, they are separated by semicolons (;).

attribute.attributeDefinition: Site name for other Protected Areas(s). If multiple names are provided, they are separated by semicolons (;).

textDomain.definition: Site name for other Protected Areas(s). If multiple names are provided, they are separated by semicolons (;).

attribute.attributeDefinition: Designation corresponding to the highest level of protection for the site, considering other Protected Areas, based on IUCN protected area categories

textDomain.definition: Designation corresponding to the highest level of protection for the site, considering other Protected Areas, based on IUCN protected area categories

attribute.attributeDefinition: Toponym of the temporary pond as reported in source 1, when available.1

textDomain.definition: Toponym of the temporary pond as reported in source 1, when available.1

attribute.attributeDefinition: Identifier or code of the temporary pond as reported in source 1, when available

textDomain.definition: Identifier or code of the temporary pond as reported in source 1, when available

attribute.attributeDefinition: Short citation identifying information source 1 from which the associated pond data were derived.

textDomain.definition: Short citation identifying information source 1 from which the associated pond data were derived.

attribute.attributeDefinition: Longitude coordinate (reproyected to EPSG:4326) of the temporary pond as reported in source 1, when available.
Latitude coordinate (reproyected to EPSG:4326) of the temporary pond as reported in source 1, when available.

Identifier of the polygon associated with the pond in source 1, when available. The polygon can be found in the associated spatial layer 'Associated_polygons_Temporary_ponds_database_V0.gpkg', matching with field 'ID_POLYGON'.

textDomain.definition: Identifier of the polygon associated with the pond in source 1, when available. The polygon can be found in the associated spatial layer 'Associated_polygons_Temporary_ponds_database_V0.gpkg', matching with field 'ID_POLYGON'.

attribute.attributeDefinition: Identifier or code of the temporary pond as reported in source 19, when available

textDomain.definition: Identifier or code of the temporary pond as reported in source 19, when available

attribute.attributeDefinition: Short citation identifying information source 19 from which the associated pond data were derived.

textDomain.definition: Short citation identifying information source 19 from which the associated pond data were derived.

attribute.attributeDefinition: Longitude coordinate (reproyected to EPSG:4326) of the temporary pond as reported in source 19, when available.
Latitude coordinate (reproyected to EPSG:4326) of the temporary pond as reported in source 19, when available.

Identifier of the polygon associated with the pond in source 19, when available. The polygon can be found in the associated spatial layer 'Associated_polygons_Temporary_ponds_database_V0.gpkg', matching with field 'ID_POLYGON'.

textDomain.definition: Identifier of the polygon associated with the pond in source 19, when available. The polygon can be found in the associated spatial layer 'Associated_polygons_Temporary_ponds_database_V0.gpkg', matching with field 'ID_POLYGON'.

attribute.attributeDefinition: Full reference corresponding to SOURCE_19, describing the original source of the pond information.

textDomain.definition: Full reference corresponding to SOURCE_19, describing the original source of the pond information.
